name: Penalty
text: Any person who violates any of the laws or rules applicable to the island reserve shall be guilty of a petty misdemeanor and shall be fined not more than $1,000 or imprisoned not more than thirty days, or both, for each offense.  Each day of each violation shall be deemed a separate offense. [L 1993, c 340, pt of §2; am L 1997, c 66, §2]
